description: STRING No. 40 // From 2018-11-01 // By Jonas Kasper Jensen www.jonaskasperjensen.com // Size 110 cm x 140 cm // Plasma in Dex garden is one out of eight paintings that all depicts a garden. The paintings have been made by painting forty computer generated gardens on top of each other in transparent layers of oil paint. All eight paintings in the series have been handled the same, but because of the analogue translation from Jensen's eyes to his hands, they are all different.
name: Plasma in DEX garden VII/VIII
